targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /${host}/ and
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r._field == "uptime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and  r.host == "${host}" and r._field == "usage_idle" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r: r.usage_idle * -1.0 + 100.0}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load5")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_threads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${host}" and 
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r._field == "n_cpus")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_iowait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "cpu"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r._field == "used" or 
      r._field == "cached" or 
      r._field == "free" or 
      r._field == "buffered" or 
      r._field == "total" or 
      r._field == "active"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Non idle activity for each core

targets.query:
//SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] =~ /cpu[0-9].*/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with usage_active: 100.0 - r.usage_idle }))
  |> drop(columns: ["usage_idle"])

panels.title: CPU usage per core

panels.description: LoadAverage represents the average number of processes waiting for CPU resources over 1, 5, and 15-minute intervals, indicating system load relative to CPU capacity.

targets.query:
//SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "load15")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: CPU Load Average

targets.query:
//SELECT mean(running) as running, mean(blocked) as blocked, mean(sleeping) as sleeping, mean(stopped) as stopped, mean(zombies) as zombies, mean(paging) as paging, mean(unknown) as unknown FROM "processes" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] != "total_threads")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.description:
Context Switches: The number of times the CPU switches between processes or threads, indicating multitasking activity and scheduler overhead.
Interrupts: "The number of signals that require immediate CPU attention, generated by hardware or software events."

targets.query:
//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(context_switches),1s)as "context switches"  FROM "kernel" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
//   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "context_switches")

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kernel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "context_switches" or r._field == "interrupts")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Kernel: Context Switches & Interrupts rate

targets.query:
from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name !~ /^loop.*/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads" or r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "wwid"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_bytes" or r["_field"] == "write_bytes")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] !~ /^loop/)
      |> drop(columns: ["host", "wwid"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "reads" or r["_field"] == "writes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] !~ /^loop/)
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "wwid"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Reads and writes which are adjacent to each other may be merged for efficiency. Thus two 4K reads may become one 8K read before it is ultimately handed to the disk, and so it will be counted (and queued) as only one I/O. These fields lets you know how often this was done.

targets.query:
from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name !~ /^loop.*/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "merged_reads" or r["_field"] == "merged_writes")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "wwid"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Disk I/O merged operations

targets.query:
//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_time" or r["_field"] == "write_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] !~ /^loop/)
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "wwid"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "io_time" or r["_field"] == "io_await" or r["_field"] == "io_svctm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] !~ /^loop/)
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "wwid"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used", mean(free) as "free" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "free")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "path", "label", "mode"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path", "device", "fstype" fill(null)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "label", "mode"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(inodes_total) as "total", mean(inodes_free) as "free", mean(inodes_used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "inodes_total" or r["_field"] == "inodes_free" or r["_field"] == "inodes_used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "label", "mode"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean("inodes_free") AS "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path", "device", "fstype" fill(null)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "inodes_free")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "label", "mode"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(free) as "free", mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "free" or r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "total")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean("in") as "in", mean("out") as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "in" or r["_field"] == "out" or r["_field"] == "swap")
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "packets_recv" or r["_field"] == "packets_sent")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
//   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tcp_close" or r["_field"] == "tcp_close_wait" or r["_field"] == "tcp_closing" or r["_field"] == "tcp_established" or r["_field"] == "tcp_fin_wait1" or r["_field"] == "tcp_fin_wait2" or r["_field"] == "tcp_last_ack" or r["_field"] == "tcp_syn_recv" or r["_field"] == "tcp_syn_sent" or r["_field"] == "tcp_time_wait")
from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "netstat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tcp_close" or r["_field"] == "tcp_close_wait" or r["_field"] == "tcp_closing" or r["_field"] == "tcp_established" or r["_field"] == "tcp_fin_wait1" or r["_field"] == "tcp_fin_wait2" or r["_field"] == "tcp_last_ack" or r["_field"] == "tcp_syn_recv" or r["_field"] == "tcp_syn_sent" or r["_field"] == "tcp_time_wait")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tcp_outrsts" or r["_field"] == "tcp_outsegs" or r["_field"] == "tcp_attemptfails" or r["_field"] == "tcp_estabresets" or r["_field"] == "tcp_incsumerrors" or r["_field"] == "tcp_inerrs" or r["_field"] == "tcp_insegs" or r["_field"] == "tcp_retranssegs")
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "interface"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

//SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "drop_in" or r["_field"] == "drop_out")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket:  "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "err_in" or r["_field"] == "err_out")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
